Name: Friends
Components: S, M (a small amount of makeup applied to the face as this spell is cast)

Name: Animal Friendship
Components: V, S, F, M (some food, which the target consumes)

Name: Identify
Components: V, S, M (a mystic quartz worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Illusory Script
Components: S, M (an amethyst-based ink worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Magic Mouth
Components: V, S, M (tanzanite dust worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Clairvoyance
Components: V, S, M (a cosmic opal worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Glyph of Warding
Components: V, S, M (incense and powdered gemstone worth at least 200 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Hypnotic Pattern
Components: S, M (incense imbued with mystic quartz dust)

Name: Nondetection
Components: V, S, M (apatite dust worth at least 25 gp sprinkled over the target, which the spell consumes)

Name: Speak with the Dead
Components: V, S, F, M (burning incense imbued with onyx dust)

Name: Stinking Cloud
Components: V, S, M (a skull, a plaguestone, or a piece of material soaked in tainted water)

Name: Awaken
Components: V, S, M (a mystic quartz worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Greater Restoration
Components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Legend Lore
Components: V, S, M (incense worth at least 500 gp and four gems, all of which the spell consumes)

Name: Planar Binding
Components: V, S, F, M (a gemstone worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Raise Dead
Components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 500 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Scrying
Components: V, S, M (either a focus worth at least 10,000 gp, such as a crystal ball,  a silver mirror, or a font filled with holy water, or a cosmic opal worth at least 1,000 gp)

Name: Teleportation Circle
Components: V, M (rare chalks and lapis lazuli ink worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Find the Path
Components: V, S, M (a map, compasses worth at least 100 gp and an object from the location you wish to find)

Name: Guards and Wards
Components: V, S, M (burning incense imbued with grey spinel, emerald and amethyst dust worth at least 150 gp each)

Name: Programmed Illusion
Components: V, S, M (tanzanite dust worth at least 25 gp)

Name: True Seeing
Components: V, S, M (an ointment for the eyes that contains mystic quartz dust worth at least 25 gp and is consumed by the spell)
